ARABIC: قَالَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى بِكُمْ قُوَّةً أَوْ ءَاوِىٓ إِلَىٰ رُكْنٍ شَدِيدٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'If only I had the strength to combat you or could take refuge in some powerful support!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I wish I had the power to resist you," said (Lot), "or powerful support."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: 'Would that I had the strength to set you straight, or could seek refuge in some powerful support.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "Would that I had the power (to overcome you) or could seek strong protection."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “If only I had the strength against you or were able to get the refuge of some strong support!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Would that I had strength to overpower you, or that I could betake myself to some powerful support."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Ah! that I had power to suppress you, rather I shall have recourse to a strong support.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'O would that I had power against you, or might take refuge in a strong pillar!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Would that I had strength to resist you or had some strong support (among you)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "If only I had the strength to stop you or could take refuge in some powerful support!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said. Would that I had strength against you or could betake me to a powerful support!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘If only I had the power to deter you, or could take refuge in a mighty support!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Would that I had power to suppress you or that I could betake myself to some powerful support."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Would that I had strength (men) to overpower you, or that I could betake myself to some powerful support (to resist you)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Would that I were powerful over you, or might take refuge in a strong pillar'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “If only I had the strength to stop you, or could rely on some strong support.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "If only I had against you some power or could take refuge in a strong support."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:80] He said, ‘Would that I had strength, power, to resist you or could resort to some strong support!’, [to] some clan that would help me, I would surely fall upon you. So, when the angels saw this,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Lot said within himself: (Would that I had strength) physical strength and sons to help me (to resist you or had some strong support (among you)!) or that I could rely on a strong clan such that I defend myself from you.
